comments:
Eclipse 200404281424   CDT Latest Head

Found numerous exceptions after pressing "Finish" on the Class Browser after 
I've added a Variable.

Steps:
1) Bring the Class Wizard by creating a new class
2) Enter any name
3) Click Link to File (Header File)
4) Click Variables
5) Click New
6) Enter Name and an invalid "C:\..." location
7) Click OK and OK again
8) Click "Finish"
